metadata.dc:author: Martínez Bruna, M S
Andériz López, M
metadata.dc:description: The study presents 391 patients with malignant general syndrome (asthenia, anorexia and involuntary weight loss) among the interns in a Internal Medicine Department, and it settles a diagnostic relation. In comparison with other studies it the diagnostic spectrum is very similar to that founded in other countries, in spite of their own characteristics.
metadata.dc:title: Espectro diagnóstico del síndrome general maligno.
[The diagnostic spectrum of the general malignancy syndrome].
